description: A massive gladiatorial arena in Dressrosa where fighters compete in battle royales. The colosseum hosts a tournament for the Mera Mera no Mi Devil Fruit, attracting powerful competitors from across the New World.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Identity Exposed in Colosseum Waiting Area
keyEvents.description: Don Chinjao exposes Luffy's true identity as Monkey D. Luffy in front of other competitors in the waiting area of the colosseum.
keyEvents.significance: The colosseum becomes a dangerous place for Luffy as his disguise is blown and multiple competitors with grudges target him.

keyEvents.title: Block B Battle Royale Intensifies
keyEvents.description: The main arena hosts the intense Block B battle royale with approximately 30 competitors fighting for advancement.
keyEvents.significance: Showcases the brutal nature of the colosseum battles and introduces multiple powerful fighters.

keyEvents.title: Bellamy's Brutal Victory in Arena
keyEvents.description: Bellamy defeats Abdullah and Jeet in the main arena with a shocking display of brutality that horrifies the crowd.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the deadly nature of colosseum combat and the ruthlessness required to succeed.

keyEvents.title: Bartolomeo's Barrier Revealed in Arena
keyEvents.description: Bartolomeo reveals his barrier ability in the main arena, breaking Hack's arm when he attempts to attack.
keyEvents.significance: The arena witnesses one of the tournament's most powerful defensive abilities, shocking competitors and spectators.

statusHistory.reason: Hosting the tournament for the Mera Mera no Mi

name.japanese: コリーダコロシアム地下

description: The area beneath the Corrida Colosseum arena where Luffy hides after his identity is exposed. This underground section provides refuge from competitors seeking to attack him.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Hides Beneath the Arena
keyEvents.description: After being pursued by Cavendish, Luffy escapes and finds refuge in the underground areas beneath the colosseum arena.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the colosseum's underground as a location where Luffy can avoid detection and plan his next moves.

statusHistory.reason: First shown as Luffy's hiding place
